attributes.action: Introduce a cap on homes for first time buyers of 1/2/3 bedroom properties.
attributes.background: If action is not taken this will leave a generation renting or in council accommodation because they simply cannot afford to buy. We need less landlords and more home owners.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
